display_long_description:
Lore: Crazy Chimp's - Shadows of the Facility
In the vast void of space, where silence is a haunting melody and the stars are unforgiving witnesses, lies the abandoned NASA revolute. Once a beacon of human ambition and scientific discovery, it now stands shattered—a tomb for forgotten dreams and an eerie battleground for survival.
The alien crash tore apart humanity's first steps into the stars, scattering chaos across the cosmos. Left stranded on the fractured facility, you and your family of chimps—intelligent, trained companions of humanity's spacefarers—fight to piece together the remnants of your existence. Days bleed into years, and with every passing moment, hope feels further away, swallowed by the black abyss.
But the alien robots arrived first. Emerging like vultures to pick apart the wreckage, they were twisted creations—machines birthed from alien ingenuity and haunted by a malicious purpose. Their sole mission? To erase every trace of humanity's survivors. They dismantled every route back to Earth, every flicker of hope. And then, as if mocking your resilience, they began their experiments.
Out of their cruel laboratories crawled the infected chimps—grotesque echoes of your kin. These were test subjects, discarded failures corrupted by alien biotechnology. Their hollow eyes burn with rage, their distorted forms
